pullrequest.title: Made the joint control widget hidden on startup

content.raw: It's probably a QT thing, but it's can be tough to drag those widgets back once they're hidden. Sometimes it doesn't recognize my click + drag. I'll approve this, but we might want to think about an easier way to display that widget.
